name: Shifting Dimensions
description:
My submission to the Major Jam 4.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Hold Spacebar - Shoot

While playing an arcade game you notice a fault that seems to make the game unbeatable. You will have to cheat against the game to be able to proceed.

Assets Used:
Simple Space, Space Kit by Kenney
Action and Battle Music Pack, 8 Bit Sounds, Fusehive Futuristic Pistols and Ships, from gamedevmarket.net
Dynamic Space Background by DinV Studio
Alien Ships Pack by Autarca
Thumbnail Art by Shauné Burchell
